description: Simple Injector is an easy, flexible and fast dependency injection library that uses best practice to guide your solutions toward the pit of success.
releaseNotes:
Simple Injector v.3.0.6 is a patch release that fixes two bugs in the core library related to the diagnostic system. The bugs caused diagnostic errors to be ignored in case decorators where used.

Bug fixes:
- Use of proxy decorator (with Func dependency for resolving decoratee) caused any possible diagnostic warnings of the decoratee (and dependencies) to be ignored. (fixes #128)
- Registrations that where wrapped with three or more decorators didn't get diagnosed. (fixes #129)

For full release notes, please read this: https://github.com/simpleinjector/SimpleInjector/releases/tag/v3.0.6
summary: Simple Injector is an easy-to-use Dependency Injection (DI) library for .NET 4+ that supports Silverlight 4+, Windows Phone 8, Windows 8 including Universal apps and Mono.
title: Simple Injector
